title: Meesho's festive sale sees record orders on first day, 100% up on year
description: Meesho saw 6.5 crore new customers on its mobile app on the first day of the sale, i.e. September 27. Amazon and Flipkart are also in the middle of their annual sales.
content: Ecommerce major Meesho saw record orders on the first day of its festive season sale, nearly double compared to the figure of last year, and also surpassed daily orders by over three times.Festive season sales kicked off this weekend for ecommerce companies led by Amazon and Flipkart launching their annual sales, to cash in on the most lucrative time of the year for online shopping.Meesho said it saw nearly 6.5 crore unique customers on its mobile app on Day 1, and about 1.5 crore app downloads ahead of the sale. Meesho Mall saw a significant growth in orders compared to last year, with nearly 45% of these orders coming from first-time customers.
